entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/legend-service/deployment/resources.yaml -p DB_SERVER=geodb-i.rootso.org -p GEO_DB_SERVER=geodb-t.verw.rootso.org -p DB_PUB=pub -p DB_EDIT=edit -p DB_OEREB=oereb_v2 -p DB_SOGIS=sogis -p USER_OGC_SERVER=ogc_server -p PW_OGC_SERVER=${PwdOgcServer} -p USER_SOGIS_SERVICE=${apiUser} -p PW_SOGIS_SERVICE=${PwdSogisService} -p USER_SOGIS_SERVICE_WRITE=${apiUser}_write -p PW_SOGIS_SERVICE_WRITE=${PwdSogisServiceWrite} -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration | oc apply -n ${namespace} -f-
